name: False Spider Demo
detailed_description:
[Strange Talk] X [Reasoning] X [Magic]
The high school student who obtained magic from the hands of the "Great Witch" Sisi, who lost her whereabouts in the medieval "Witch Trials" - MAYA KUROSE,
In order to find important people who have been involved in a strange story in the past, they began weaving one "pseudo strange story" after another.
All the hidden truths behind will wait for players to personally uncover them



Game type:
The story will combine bizarre stories and magic, and players will play characters through experiencing high school campus daily life and creating bizarre stories or engaging in battles through magic.
As a text-based game, it will provide players with visual novel and comic experiences through visuals.
This game only requires you to click with the mouse to play. The game will include options, and selecting specific options will take you to different routes.



Game content:
·The demo trial version is estimated to last about an hour, while the official version is estimated to last for 5 to 10 hours or more.
·A Japanese style suspenseful detective fantasy script created by mixing elements of bizarre stories, urban legends, and medieval witches.
·The demo trial version contains 10+CG illustrations and storyboard illustrations, while the official version is estimated to contain 50+CG illustrations

False Spider "was serialized in the form of a web comic by two authors during their high school years, and now it is finally gamified!
